entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries over northern sections overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:58 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:58 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending early in the evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:58 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
